name: Eseye
overview:
Eseye is a Machine to Machine (M2M) service provider with our own infrastructure (APN) and multiple operator interconnect agreements.

With customers globally in multiple market segments, we have the necessary expertise to assist you with getting your devices connected using mobile technology. M2M+ service from ESEYE goes beyond providing SIM cards with competitive pricing. By combining our in-house product engineering and systems integration skills we are able to offer a comprehensive, reliable, turnkey solution focused entirely in the connected devices‚ market. Our engineering and commercial expertise means you always get the right price and technical solution bespoke to your needs. We offer complete support services, from the initial ENGINEERING and product design phase (SIM integration), to fully launching CONNECTIVITY (SIM provision), through to product management services utilising our SIM management portal which includes configurable alerting and billing options. Our development expertise spans products in manufacturing, healthcare, security and environmental monitoring industries where we have implemented SIM technology into multiple products. Our aim is to provide the M2M expertise you seek when integrating cellular technology into devices. Our services can be combined or used separately, as required, to develop and launch your product. We aim to give you access to the right resources whilst gaining speed to market and confidence in partnering with Eseye to deliver your connectivity needs.
